urlshortener-action-done: Message when the action is done
urlshortener-approved-domains: Help message displayed on Special:UrlShortener showing which domains can be shortened. $1 is the number of domains, $2 is a comma separated list of domains.
urlshortener-blocked: Error message shown when the user is blocked
urlshortener-copy: Label of button to copy generated URL to clipboard.
urlshortener-copy-fail: Message shown when copyging to clipboard failed.
urlshortener-copy-success: Message shown when copyging to clipboard was successful.
urlshortener-deleted: Error message shown if the shortened URL is deleted.
urlshortener-disabled: Error message shown when the extension is configured in read-only mode.
urlshortener-enter-short-code-delete: Label for input for URL short code to delete
urlshortener-enter-short-code-restore: Label for input for URL short code to restore
urlshortener-error-badports: Error message shown when the URL cannot be shortened because it contains a port (e.g. http://example.org:90/path)
urlshortener-error-disallowed-url: Message shown to user when they try to shorten URLs to a domain that isn't whitelisted. $1 refers to the domain of the URL that the user tried to shorten
urlshortener-error-malformed-url: Message shown to the user when they try to submit a malformed URL
urlshortener-error-nouserpass: Error message shown when the URL cannot be shortened because it contains a username or password (e.g. http://user:password@example.org/)
urlshortener-failed-try-again: Generic failure message with option to try again
urlshortener-form-header: Message shown above the form where the user can paste a URL to be shortened
urlshortener-manage-not-enough-data: Error message when not enough provided to do any action
urlshortener-not-found-message:
Message for page shown when user tries to access a short url that does not exist.

The page title for this message is {{msg-mw|Urlshortener-not-found-title}}.
urlshortener-ratelimit: Error message shown when a user shortens too many urls in a short period of time
urlshortener-short-code-is-not-deleted: Error when the URL is not deleted (so it can't be restored)
urlshortener-short-code-not-found: Error when short URL is not found or already deleted
urlshortener-shortened-url-label: Message shown to user above the shortened URL
urlshortener-toolbox: Text of link in toolbox to get shortened URL
urlshortener-url-input-label:
Label for the box the user inputs the URL to shorten.
{{Identical|URL}}
urlshortener-url-input-submit: Label for the submit button that shortens the URL
urlshortener-url-input-submitting: Label for the submit button while the user waits for the result
urlshortener-url-too-long: Error message when URL is too long, $1 is the limit
